titles.title: A resolution designating September 12, 2011, as "National Day of Encouragement."

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 9/13/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates September 12, 2011, as National Day of Encouragement. Acknowledges the importance of encouragement and positive influences in the lives of all people. Urges Americans to encourage others to boost the morale of all Americans.
